name: Elementals
description:
Mental Elementals is a 1 – 4 player twin stick shooter game. Player must use their element to fight through the level and reach the end as quickly as possible. Player’s can combine elements to create interesting effects.

players will be able;

- Choose one of the four elementals, Fire, Water, Earth and Air to use to fight their way through dungeons.
- Combine elements to create new devastating effects
- Battle your way through various rooms with enemies and puzzles
- play with up for 4 players
